name: Bleak (itch) (Long Story Studios)
description:
In a world of nothing, you have a power that's truly something. 

Not everyone's a fan. 

CONTROLS:

  • Click to begin game. 
  • WASD to move. 
  • F/Left Mouse to Use Power. 
  • Spacebar/Right Mouse to Repel.

TIPS:

  • This world of nothing does not take kindly to change. Your POWER will be used against you.
  • DISRUPTIONS must first be REPELLED before your POWER can be used on them.

Music/SFX sounds much better on the standalone versions.

This game was made over a weekend as part of Ludum Dare 45, with the theme of "start from nothing." Created by @LongStoryStudio. 
To see more of our work, check us out atlongstorystudios.com!
